originalText.text: Would recommend for any struggling female out there they will help get you back on track.

text.text: Would recommend for any struggling female out there they will help get you back on track.

originalText.text: I was there a year and a half ago am WOW they changed my life forever I got back on track right away I am clean now for a year and 6 months. I am a manager now at a beauty supply store got a car money in my pocket got my family and friends back I have a life again at 45 thought I never would. The staff there is absolutely amazing they show you how to live life again ,respect and how to be honest with yourself and others. They give you tough love that only makes you stronger then ever. I really appreciate everything you done for me and others love you all for giving me my precious life back.

originalText.text:
This place is filthy, I been here less than 2 months and I contracted Covid.
NEVER HAD COVID, UNTIL I CAME HERE!!.
The staff is understaffed and very unprofessional.
Terrible.
They do not deserve any stars.
Unfortunately 1 is the lowest.

originalText.text: A great and beautiful place that has saved my life. If you need help getting your child and or getting back on your feet definitely try coming here for help. Has alot of freedom if you do what your supposed to do.. staff is very supportive and the place is very clean. :)

originalText.text: The ladies manning the security desk and lobby door were very professional and courteous.
